Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillborough Way, north of the Shrine of Death.
Room.LongDescription: There are two shrines on the south side of the road: the Shrine of Life and the Shrine of Death. They are essentially contained in the same building, but are distinctly separate. All clerics must go through the Shrines in order to complete their intermediate level training.
